job_des: Facebook is an innovation consultancy that creates new digital products, services, and businesses to deliver highly profitable growth for the world's most ambitious software designers. Located in Sunnyvale, California, we are looking for talented software engineers to join our staff of exceptional professionals. You will work with some of the best companies in the field on exciting development projects.

job_des: We are looking for a Database Engineer to join our growing team. You will be responsible for developing, testing, improving, and maintaining new and existing databases to help users retrieve data effectively. In addition, the candidate should have the desire to support end-users, troubleshoot issues, and assist with testing while building out new capabilities
job_res: Analyze user requirements and translate them into database requirements and code.Design and develop SQL objects including stored procedures, functions, triggers, and views.Support and enhance automation and data transformation projects.Optimize, tune, and troubleshoot SQL code.
edu_req: Bachelor degree to complete any reputational university.

job_des: Job Description: A UI/UX (User Interface/User Experience) designer is responsible for designing and creating engaging and effective interfaces for software and web applications. This includes designing the layout, visual design, and interactivity of the user interface.
job_res: Job Responsibility: Collaborating with cross-functional teams: UI/UX designers often work closely with other teams, including product management, engineering, and marketing, to ensure that the user interface is aligned with business and technical requirements. You will need to be able to effectively communicate your design ideas and gather feedback from other team members.
edu_req: Bachelor degree to complete any reputational university.

job_des: As a Product Designer, focused on watch faces, you all rely on user-centered design methods to craft industry-leading user experiences, from concept to execution. You will collaborate with your design partners to leverage and build beautiful, innovative, inspired products that people love to use
job_res: Work with cross-functional partners to conceptualize and deliver watch face visual, motion, and system design directions.Lead design projects that either seek to conceptualize individual products or define the vision for a category as a whole.Explore future opportunities for Google Hardware through speculative design projects.
